about_the_game:
KVD has one developer and the gameplay shown above is from a prototype showcasing the direction the flow of combat will go: fast-paced 1v1 ground and air combat with different weapons, skills, and powerups for both players.

Gameplay


A frantic struggle between good and evil springs to life in Knight Versus Demon when a VR player takes on the role of a villain going up against the hero: a local player using a controller or keyboard / mouse.

The Villain [VR]

The villain has a variety of ways to defeat the hero - these include using hands to slash, fingers to impale, a mouth to burn, and eyes to melt the shiniest armor any human might equip.

The Hero [PC]

The hero uses his speed and light affinity to quickly dash through the air delivering blows with his sword and volleys from his bow while leaving behind traps that would cause serious harm to the mightiest of demons.

Content


Planned content includes:

- Multiple stages
- A variety of weapons
- VR physics-based weapons
- Armor
- Customizable skills
- Special abilities
- Powerups
